channel.title: CVE Feed for Debian -- dpkg
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Debian -- dpkg

item.title: CVE-2022-1664|2024-09-17T02:16:10.760Z -- debian -- dpkg
item.description: Dpkg::Source::Archive in dpkg, the Debian package management system, before version 1.21.8, 1.20.10, 1.19.8, 1.18.26 is prone to a directory traversal vulnerability. When extracting untrusted source packages in v2 and v3 source package formats that include a debian.tar, the in-place extraction can lead to directory traversal situations on specially crafted orig.tar and debian.tar tarballs.
